works.description:
The copy righted name of my product, nose brace, which is also the trade mark of my business, is infringed upon. My product is absolutely and illegally misrepresented, and defamed when a  search is done on Google under nose brace,  Nose Brace, or NOSE BRACE.

By providing search results linked to text articles as well as images under my product name "nose brace", which mostly are not at all my product nose brace, or are not mostly related to my product nose brace, the search results have caused defamation of my product nose brace, as well as the sales of my product nose brace have gone down, despite my added advertisement.  I have documented all these facts.

For example, supposedly, medical doctors and authorities  have written articles that claim "nose braces" don't work, and thus defaming my product.  When in reality one reads the articles, they are talking about other products.  However, Google's search results and these, supposedly, professional people are using the name "nose brace" illegally, without my permission, and they are misrepresenting  facts and as a result defamation and loss of revenue for my business.

I request from Google to immediately and effectively correct this problem.
